main event: A civilian observed a round yellow object moving very fast and heading straight downward in Kentfield, California on 19 May 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., The object was described as round and yellow., The witness noted that the object was moving very fast., The sighting was classified as a possible meteor., The object went behind the hills after observation.
witness description: civilian, housewife sitting on back porch
